channel.title: Problem with RSPS CLIENTS
channel.description:
Whenever i actually login to a client, it allows me to play for a short time, this is lags out, so i look at the command prompt window that opens up when starting the client, and i got this (I was playing on Armageddon Client)::::
By using this client you agree that you are not an employee of Jagex LTD , runescape, or adlex solicitors, echo and are not a family member or acquaintance of the aforementioned.
Project Armageddon Client - release #1.3 Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 9731 at client.dns(client) at client.charAt(client) at client.getDocumentBase(client) at client.read(client) at client.Z(client) at I.run(I) at client.run(client) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
HELP PLEASE :( :confused:

item.title: Problem with RSPS CLIENTS

item.description:
@wcd727 wrote:

wow…good advice…the problem is i CAN’T RUN IT…honestly

item.title: Problem with RSPS CLIENTS
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

You musta added something on line 9731…
IF you use notepad to edit things, do CRTL G or CRTL H (one of those to find the line and go fix it)

Read full topic
